page.title: 08Places of Worship
page.content:
{St Michael's Parish Church (C of E),} Rector, Rev' T Sampson. Sunday Services: 8am., 9.30am and 6.30pm. Sunday School: 9.30am. { {Holy Trinity Church (C of E),} Vicar, Rev' M P Brion. Sunday Services: 10.45am and 6.30pm. Sunday School: 10.45am. { {Salvation Army, Lieutenant Gaudion. Sunday Services: 11am and 6.30pm. Sunday School: 10am and 2pm. { {The Gospel Hall,} Sunday Services: 10.15am and 6pm. Sunday School: 12noon.
{Other services are held during the {week in each of the places of worship.
